name: CRITs
description: Integration for CRITs, an open source malware and threat repository

options.name: CRITs Hostname
options.description: The hostname for your CRITs server including "http://" or "https://" as required.

options.name: API Key
options.description: Your API key for authenticating to CRITs

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Lookup IP Address Resources
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup IP addresses

options.name: Lookup Hashes
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup MD5, SHA1 and SHA256 indicators

options.name: Lookup Domains
options.description: If checked, the integration will lookup domains
